divs: sighting detailsi was going west on hillcrest rd, i noticed a very bright silver object going east it was 1:55 pm on 10\24\2013, i pulled over to the side of the road, and saw the object speed up ,slow down, stop, make 90 degree turns.another vehicle saw the object and pull over in front of me to watch. we watched almost two min. before the object made another 90 degree turn and speed off to the west at a high rate of speed
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Hogansville
There were no other sightings in Hogansville on or around October 24th 2013
Summary: Silver object , early afternoon, very bright in the sunlight, no cloud cover
